org.ardenus

Class Monitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ardenus.Monitor

  • public class Monitor
extends java.lang.Object
    Used for getting information about the monitors currently connected to the machine.
    Author:
    Trent "Whirvis" Summerlin
